sections.description: Automatically compress and optimize images, resize larger files, convert to WebP. Do it in bulk or upon load and turbocharge your WordPress site performance.
sections.installation:
Get started with a few easy steps
1. Install & activate : Image optimizer by Elementor
2. Go to media library or Elementor Gallery and upload an image/ choose image to compress / use Bulk optimize option
3. Start compressing (according to the settings the user defines)
